Description:
Tai Roto Bay offers spacious, authentic accommodation located on its own private beach on the southern tip from Ootu beach. It is a beach front property and safe to swim at all tides.

All bungalows have a private balcony, private bathroom and equipped with self-catering facilities which includes a kitchenette, fridge, microwave, kettle, toaster and kitchen utensils.  An open grill is also available for barbecue nights on the beach.

The absolute beachfront bungalow provides an absolute stunning view of the beautiful lagoon which is right on our door step. The garden rooms including a stand alone one bedroom family room provide a partial lagoon and beach view.

It is a stroll away from the most popular caf√©, several restaurants and bars surrounding Ootu point. Scooter, bicycle & kayak rentals can be booked on site.
